name: Smith Riot Goggles - Women's
description: Lightweight, flexible, and comfy, the Riot Goggles conform to lots of different face shapes for gap-free, pressure-free wear. Includes 2 lenses, one for bright sun and one for overcast or cloudy days.Designed for medium sized faces.ChromaPop® lenses deliver exceptional clarity, high contrast, and dynamic colour optimization, making them great for challenging light conditions.Ventilated cylindrical lenses provide crisp detail edge-to-edge.Tapered Lens Technology (TLT) ensures accurate colors and distortion free viewing.Urethane frame uses Responsive Fit™ that's very flexible without losing strength, so it adjusts to contours of any face shape.2-layer DriWix foam provides a comfortable, breathable seal.Wide, silicone backed strap has a quick-fit adjustment system.Includes a spare yellow with 65% visible light transmission.Includes an extra lens and a microfiber goggle bag.
